title: david678345
author: david678345
content: Hi do you know of any exchanges that offer no deposit bonuses. I have read that many forex platforms offer no deposit bonuses with the idea of enticing you to start trading.But I don't know of any cryptocurrency exchanges that offer these no deposit bonuses...does anyone know of any?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: What is your purpose why are you looking for a no deposit bonus?Have you tried to check Binance exchange I never receive any deposit bonus out there except for the welcome offer. Same on OKX exchange they do have referral reward but no deposit bonus.You can also check Defi exchange like Uniswap or use P2P exchange like Bisq.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Did you mean "with deposit bonus"? i don't see how no deposit bonus would specifically help entice people, it's usually the other way around.If so, check bybit's and coinbase's referral programs. Afaik, even the referees get few bucks if they deposit and trade certain amounts. Do read the terms and conditions for this so you know all the prerequisites that should be satisfied. But ofc I do not recommend solely signing up for deposit bonuses.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Those kinds of bonuses are common when an exchange is just starting out, I remember I enjoyed quite a number of them on bybit including a deposit bonus, but I don't think they are there anymore.If you want to stand a chance, try looking for exchanges that are trying to break into the market through promotions

comments.author: malcovi2
comments.body: I don't think there is any exchange would offer no deposit bonus but probably if its a forex website but they wouldn't let you withdraw the bonus until you are able to hit the required criterias.Quote from: BitMaxz on October 06, 2022, 04:25:36 PMWhat is your purpose why are you looking for a no deposit bonus?Have you tried to check Binance exchange I never receive any deposit bonus out there except for the welcome offer. Same on OKX exchange they do have referral reward but no deposit bonus.You can also check Defi exchange like Uniswap or use P2P exchange like Bisq.He is looking for no deposit which I don't think there is one, The only I took part in one is BitOasis but that was years ago.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: If you don't like the deposit bonuses then just don't claim it or there's something wrong with how you've typed the no, instead of welcome/deposit bonus.Usually, most exchanges not only in forex platforms but in crypto exchanges, they offer a lot of bonuses because they want to get as many new customers as they can.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: It’s rare to see someone is looking for a site that gives no bonuses while many are aiming for this and want to take advantage of those bonuses. Are you afraid that if you receive bonus your account will experience some problem or might be restricted? Exchanges have this kind of promotions to attract more traders and investors, and most probably this kind of promotions wont affect the platform itself, they will surely have budget on this so don’t be afraid to get some bonus, that’s a free money.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Most likely the deposit bonus only is for the people who created an account for the first time and just a small amount only like around 10$ approximately at the same time is it is not barely needed if you want to make a trade instead if you want to seek a bonuses like this better to play with gambling casinos because most of.the time they are offering this kind of feature.

comments.author: topman21
comments.body: Quote from: david678345 on October 05, 2022, 07:45:55 PMHi do you know of any exchanges that offer no deposit bonuses. I have read that many forex platforms offer no deposit bonuses with the idea of enticing you to start trading.But I don't know of any cryptocurrency exchanges that offer these no deposit bonuses...does anyone know of any?Yes there are many cryptocurrency exchanges that have no deposit bonuses. I have never received a deposit bonus from any of the exchanges I have liaised with and worked with till date.I have seen such news and experiences especially when two gaming platforms offer deposit bonuses.Moreover, no deposit bonus is given to you by any good exchange.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Try FTX or Bybit. These exchanges are popular right now. And also when you signup try to not use any referral links from other people if you don't want to get some deposit bonuses (applicable in other exchanges too, just try)This is my first time to see a person who doesn't want a bonus

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: These days there are no exchanges that give any bonuses. Most exchanges can give you lower fees if you trade more or buy into their token. But none that just give you money for opening an account. It would get abused to death similar to why many gambling bitcoin casinos had to remove the faucets. I remember Coinbase actually had a $10 no deposit bonus. Many people made the account back in like 2015 and forgot about it. Then when they went back, they had like $500 because the bonus was in BTC and not USD.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Quote from: david678345 on October 05, 2022, 07:45:55 PMHi do you know of any exchanges that offer no deposit bonuses. I have read that many forex platforms offer no deposit bonuses with the idea of enticing you to start trading.But I don't know of any cryptocurrency exchanges that offer these no deposit bonuses...does anyone know of any?How will a trader get excited to trade with no deposit bonus?. If you meant with deposit bonuses then it's commonly found with most big exchanges although not all, example  Lbank comes with huge welcome bonus and deposit bonus. If what i presume isn't what you mean then i see no way a trader will get excited to trade without bonuses no matter how small the bonus may be. Bonus is a way of encouragement from exchanges. But if its no deposit bonus you seek i think it might take a good search to find one that has reputation

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: david678345 on October 05, 2022, 07:45:55 PMHi do you know of any exchanges that offer no deposit bonuses. I have read that many forex platforms offer no deposit bonuses with the idea of enticing you to start trading.But I don't know of any cryptocurrency exchanges that offer these no deposit bonuses...does anyone know of any?Forex trading platforms doesn't really provide you any promo like you mentioned, the bonus comes when you make a deposit and its actually a strategy by the platform to increase your spending amount and it can be deceiving as well.No real crypto exchange offers such bonus, if you don't have the capital to start trading then you will not be their target to reach but they do have other promotional events like referral bonus,etc.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Quote from: david678345 on October 05, 2022, 07:45:55 PMHi do you know of any exchanges that offer no deposit bonuses. I have read that many forex platforms offer no deposit bonuses with the idea of enticing you to start trading.But I don't know of any cryptocurrency exchanges that offer these no deposit bonuses...does anyone know of any?Forex and crypto platforms are different and you may not know that they also offer deposit bonuses. But as long as you don't claim the deposit bonus, you won't receive it.On Binance, you will get a bonus offer if you deposit a certain amount, which you can use immediately. Likewise, with other exchanges, it will be up to you. If you want it, you can accept it and claim it and if not, just leave the offer and continue your trading.

comments.author: AicecreaME
comments.body: Quote from: david678345 on October 05, 2022, 07:45:55 PMHi do you know of any exchanges that offer no deposit bonuses. I have read that many forex platforms offer no deposit bonuses with the idea of enticing you to start trading.But I don't know of any cryptocurrency exchanges that offer these no deposit bonuses...does anyone know of any?I bet you meant exchanges that gives bonuses after you deposit on them. If I'm not mistaken, Binance gives you vouchers in USDT something like that after you deposit a certain amount on them and verified your account, correct me if I'm wrong though. I believe bonuses are the main reason why people want to start trading because of that, it's like an starting extra capital in trading. Like free satoshis in faucets.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Unusual question.  Who doesn't like freebies?Try an unknown exchange. But don't expect that your money will be safe there. I checked Poloniex and I think they don't have a deposit bonus but rather giveaways thru trading in 7 days. Maybe you want to start there and if they ever gave you a bonus then contact support and tell them to take it back.

comments.author: Danydee72
comments.body: I think you should clarify your question. The "no" may mislead.1. Do you mean bonuses without the need to deposit some amount?2. or do you mean no bonuses at all?

comments.author: rozak
comments.body: Quote from: david678345 on October 05, 2022, 07:45:55 PMHi do you know of any exchanges that offer no deposit bonuses. events for new members are usually carried out by new exchanges. while exchanges that have been running for a long time usually hold events for referral programs. and that's only for a certain period.be careful with events that new exchanges do like that. because the bonus given is of course after you do the KYC process. instead, you submit your documents for a fraudulent exchange.be wise in choosing the exchange.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Centralized exchanges prefer to keep people's cryptocurrencies under their control, so there is no such bonus even though they actually compete with each other when it comes to attracting customers. Unless you mean bonuses are not for new users, over the last month I have been urged by binance to send my KYC for some bonuses (I don't really pay attention to the value) with no additional deposit.

comments.author: Bitum
comments.body: There is no "no deposit bonus" on crypto exchanges.There are bonuses you can get just if you deposit and start trading. Then you can collect some bonuses, many exchange has their offer program.
